channel.title: [code fix] Help with checkboxes
channel.description: ive been trying too get check boxes working for something on the server GUI im not releasing full details because it would ruin the surprise but im having trouble adding the action listener ive been looking on a tut for this but all the ones that ive found havnt been what im looking for this is what i want though when the box is check i want one action performed and when the box is unchecked i want another action performed so far ive gotten the checkbox labeled and placed where i want it

item.title: [code fix] Help with checkboxes

item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

ty

Read full topic

item.title: [code fix] Help with checkboxes
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

[code] button = new JCheckBox(“Button”);
button.setMnemonic(KeyEvent.VK_C);
button.setSelected(false);

button.addItemListener(this);

public void itemStateChanged(ItemEvent e) {

Object box = e.getItemSelectable();
if (box == button) {
    misc.printlnTag("Thank you Rictoo");
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
